duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform installations and changes of broadband services, adhering to applicable codes, requirements, and company procedures to provide an outstanding customer experience.
Update customer account and troubleshoot customer inquiries and concerns to ensure products and services are working properly.
Use installation tools, hand tools, and perform jobs from high places, including climbing poles and roofs with proper equipment.
Manipulate connectors, fasteners, wire, and use hand tools while lifting and carrying heavy loads and working in confined spaces.
Maintain proper equipment and drive company vehicle in a safe manner while working and traveling in inclement weather.
Complete required training, certifications, and safety requirements to ensure continued employment.
Work in areas with exposure to moderate noise level, confined spaces, and inclement weather, and maintain regular and punctual attendance.
Perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
